# Third Party Wallets

Raptoreum supports the following third-party wallets:

## Zelcore
Zelcore is a multi-asset wallet that supports Raptoreum and other cryptocurrencies. It is a lite wallet, offering a user-friendly interface and multi-platform support.

Weblink: [https://zelcore.io/](https://zelcore.io/)


## Komodo Wallet
Komodo is another multi-asset wallet that supports Raptoreum. It provides a good balance between usability and security, making it a popular choice for many users.

Weblink: [https://komodoplatform.com/](https://komodoplatform.com/)


## Vidulum
Vidulum is a web-based multi-asset wallet that supports Raptoreum. It allows easy access from any device with an internet connection, offering convenience for users on the go.

Weblink: [https://vidulum.app/](https://vidulum.app/)


## Forsa Wallet
Forsa Wallet is a lite wallet that supports Raptoreum. It is designed to be easy to use and provides essential features for managing your RTM. It also integrates to Pecunias Smartnode service allowing you to setup Smartnodes directly from the Forsa wallet.

Weblink: [https://forsa.net/](https://forsa.net/)
